title: The Chicest Prime Day Sneaker Deals Are Flying
description: Refresh your shoe rack with chic, editor-approved markdowns you can’t miss.
excerpt: Snag these unbeatable deals from your favorite brands before they’re gone.
text: The cult-favorite Puma Speedcat is currently at its lowest price. That is, until it inevitably sells out again. Good luck finding your size.Sizes: 5.5-11Materials: 100% SuedeCustomer Review: “Normally wear size 6.5, purchased size 7 & not only are they comfortable but they are gorgeous. Buy them!”Adidas Samba OG Womens SneakerYou can never go wrong with a pair of Samba sneakers. This pair earns bonus points thanks to an all-white design that matches everything.Sizes: 5-11Materials: Textile syntheticCustomer Review: “These are the best walking shoes I've ever owned. I use them all the time when walking my huskies.”Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowOnitsuka Tiger Serrano SneakersWith its unmistakable criss cross logo, Onitsuka Tiger have become a world-famous superstar. Lean into the sporty phenomenon with this navy and gold pair.Sizes: 4-12.5Materials: LeatherCustomer Review: “Absolutely awesome! I’ve been looking to replace my old ones for a long time. I found these on Amazon and bought them immediately. Took a couple weeks to get them, but it was well worth it. They’re perfect. They fit perfectly. I already knew my size which is typically a 9 1/2 in women’s, but I wear a nine in these shoes. That could be a men’s nine but it’s a 9 and it fits like a glove. I typically only wear them to ride my stationary bike or spin class. My old ones I did everything in them. I’m just trying to take care of these.”Salomon XA PRO 3D Gore-Tex Waterproof Trail Running ShoesIf you needed further proof that functional sneakers can also be fashionable, Salomon’s trendy sneakers are all the evidence you need. html:
The cult-favorite Puma Speedcat is currently at its lowest price. That is, until it inevitably sells out again. Good luck finding your size.

Sizes: 5.5-11

Materials: 100% Suede

Customer Review: “Normally wear size 6.5, purchased size 7 & not only are they comfortable but they are gorgeous. Buy them!”

Adidas Samba OG Womens Sneaker

You can never go wrong with a pair of Samba sneakers. Upgrade your collection with this metallic pair that can easily mix and match with all of your summer outfits.

Sizes: 5-10

Materials: Leather

Customer Review: “Love it! Very cute and comfortable! I recommend!”

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

The Plush One

Reebok Classic Nylon Sneaker

I can’t stop reaching for this easy-to-clean nylon sneaker from Reebok—the neutral colors mean I can wear it with anything, and I can walk for miles without worrying about blisters.

Sizes: 5-11

Materials: Rubber, nylon

Customer Review: “Beautiful pair of sneakers that fit true to size! Comfort and style! Love them!”

On Cloud 5 Running Shoe

When it comes to comfort, sneakers from On reign supreme. This pair earns bonus points thanks to an all-white design that matches everything.

Sizes: 5-11

Materials: Textile synthetic

Customer Review: “These are the best walking shoes I've ever owned. The support and cushioning comfort is amazing! I use them all the time when walking my huskies.”

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Onitsuka Tiger Serrano Sneakers

With its unmistakable criss cross logo, Onitsuka Tiger have become a world-famous superstar. Lean into the sporty phenomenon with this navy and gold pair.

Sizes: 4-12.5

Materials: Leather

Customer Review: “Absolutely awesome! I’ve been looking to replace my old ones for a long time. I found these on Amazon and bought them immediately. Took a couple weeks to get them, but it was well worth it. They’re perfect. They fit perfectly. I already knew my size which is typically a 9 1/2 in women’s, but I wear a nine in these shoes. That could be a men’s nine but it’s a 9 and it fits like a glove. I typically only wear them to ride my stationary bike or spin class. My old ones I did everything in them. I’m just trying to take care of these.”

Salomon XA PRO 3D Gore-Tex Waterproof Trail Running Shoes

If you needed further proof that functional sneakers can also be fashionable, Salomon’s trendy sneakers are all the evidence you need. These trail-ready trainers not only look great, but they’re equipped with waterproof materials to keep your feet dry.

Sizes: 5-12

Materials: 100% Synthetic

Customer Review: “Honestly the best shoe out there. I don’t hike but I do train dogs in grass-woods-hilly anreas… all different types of terrain! Best shoes. Also great around our small farm. I hate farm boots. You won’t regret your purchase.”

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

The Platform One

Reebok Club C Double Revenge Platform Tennis Shoes

This design features a bold, chunky sole and a striking black-and-white color scheme that adds the perfect touch of contrast.

Sizes: 5-11

Materials: Rubber, leather

Customer Review: “I’ve been wearing the Reebok Club C Double Platform sneakers for a while now, and they’ve definitely become a go-to in my rotation. If you’re into classic silhouettes with a modern twist, these are a great choice.”

Converse Unisex Low TOP Black Size 6 Women/ 4 Men

From Zendaya to Rihanna, this timeless sneaker will forever be a celebrity favorite. And it’s majorly marked down right now.

Sizes: 6.5-18

Materials: Canvas

Customer Review: “I absolutely love these shoes. I have been a Converse fan for quite a long time! These are true to their size and color, which is a traditional khaki brown, which is hard to find. I get compliments everywhere to go with these on. Many people mention that they’ve never seen Converse in this color before.”

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Clean and Classic

Puma Carina 2.0 Sneaker

If you’re after a classic white shoe, this comfy option will pair with practically everything in your closet.

Sizes: 5.5-11, available in wide

Materials: Rubber, faux leather

Customer Review: “These shoes are exactly what I was looking for! Super cute and can be dressed up or down. I have a wide foot so I purchase the wide width and they are so comfortable!”

The Perfect Pink

New Balance 574 V2 Spring Sneaker

I’m fawning over these 574’s in the most beautiful shade! I personally believe that everyone needs a pink sneaker in their line-up.

Sizes: 5-12, available in wide

Materials: Suede, mesh, polyester

Customer Review: “I love these pink New Balance sneakers! I get so many compliments. The pale pink color is adorable!”

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Pops of Color

Gola Viper Sneaker

I love Gola for the fun colorways, and this sneaker is sure to make a statement. This pink shoe with a pop of blue is ideal for elevating casual weekend looks.

Sizes: 5-11

Materials: Rubber, leather

Customer Review: “They fit great, look great and will be a versatile summer staple!”

The Chunky Sole

Reebok Court Advance Surge Platform Sneakers

These retro-style, chunky sneakers are unbelievably comfortable. Style them with slouchy crew socks and all your summer-ready workout wear.

Sizes: 5-11

Materials: Rubber, leather

Customer Review: “I just love these shoes, great quality and they look good with everything! I get lots of compliments when I’m wearing them. They are super comfortable.”

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

The Sleek One

Veja Volley Sneaker

You can’t go wrong with this simple style. I always return to my Veja’s when I’m seeking all-day comfort.

Sizes: 4-11

Materials: Rubber, cotton, faux leather

Customer Review: “I get so many compliments every time I wear these shoes. The comfort is amazing. They are well made and the perfect complement to my wardrobe.”

Trail-Bound

Columbia Novo Trail Sneaker

Looking for a new hiking shoe? This chic, neutral pair will have you trekking for miles in style.

Sizes: 5-12, available in wide

Materials: Rubber, canvas, mesh

Customer Review: “I bought these for a camping trip, and wore them right out of the box, no break-in necessary. They fit my feet well, and provided lots of support. The soles are tough and grip well while hiking on rock or soil.”

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

The Minimalist

Lacoste Hydez Leather Sneaker

Lacoste is known for their comfortable footwear, and this minimalist style is no exception. The clean design and subtle logo makes this pair a must-have for summer.

Sizes: 5-13

Materials: Rubber, leather

Customer Review: “One of the best purchases I have ever made on Amazon! I use these for golf. They are lightweight and comfortable.”

For Running Miles

Reebok Classic Harman Run Sneaker

The Harman is another stylish and versatile style for everything from workouts to running weekend errands.

Sizes: 3.5-15

Materials: Rubber, faux leather

Customer Review: “Perfect sneaker for elevating my everyday look! I wear them to work where I walk about 15 miles a day and they’ve held up great while making my outfits look stylish. Fits true to size.”

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Stepping on Clouds

Adidas Cloudfoam Pure Sneaker

Always in a rush? This style slips on effortlessly—and features a convenient back loop for an even quicker fit.

Sizes: 5-11

Materials: Rubber, mesh

Customer Review: “These are my OG shoes. Will always and forever love my cloudfoams. Cute with jeans, shorts or athletic wear. Does not cause discomfort to the arch! Easy to wash, and can even be machine dried without fear of shrinking.”

The Maximalist

New Balance 608 V5 Casual Comfort Cross Trainer

‘Dad-style’ sneakers are back, and this ultra chunky, maximalist style is perfect for pairing with all your flared jeans and summer dresses.

Sizes: 5-12, available in narrow and wide

Materials: Rubber, leather

Customer Review: “This is the most comfortable shoe I’ve had in years! Good cushioning and support, and great room through the toes.”

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

The Go-To

Adidas Grand Court 2.0 Tennis Shoe

Don’t sleep on this deal—this style is a true must-have. This pair isn’t just seriously chic, it’s incredibly durable. I’ve worn mine for over a year, and they still show barely any signs of wear.

Sizes: 4.5-14

Materials: Rubber, faux leather

Customer Review: “Love these shoes! The cushion is lovely. The colors are perfect for most outfits. They go the distance and provide complete support when walking or during other activities.”

Calming Shades

New Balance 237 V1 Classic Sneaker

New Balance always delivers when it comes to style and comfort. How can you say no to this dreamy colorway?

Sizes: 5-13

Materials: Rubber, suede

Customer Review: “Super comfortable and so cute! They have a nice arch support and for being light in color, they really don’t get very dirty and are easy to wipe clean.”
